title: Five Ten Freerider Pro Mid VCS & Trail Cross GTX MTB Shoes have your feet covered as seasons change
content:
As the weather changes, you may find that your trusty Five Tens just aren’t cutting it. For those colder, potentially wetter months, Five Ten still has you covered with two new shoes—the Freerider Pro Mid VCS and the Trail Cross GTX. Freerider Pro Mid VCS Calling it a ‘shoulder season’ shoe, the Freerider Pro Mid

The post Five Ten Freerider Pro Mid VCS & Trail Cross GTX MTB Shoes have your feet covered as seasons change appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
